# scale

**Instance Property**

A scale factor for the local coordinate space the reference object defines.

## Declaration

```swift
var scale: simd_float3 { get }
```

## Discussion

Multiplying the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARReferenceObject/extent] by this scale results in the physical size of the object in meters.

## Examining a Reference Object

- **name**: A descriptive name for the reference object.
- **resourceGroupName**
- **center**: The center point of the reference object’s space-mapping data.
- **extent**: The size of the reference object’s space-mapping data.
